verbose_text: Hyperthermia not only enhances tumor vascular permeability to promote the delivery of anticancer drug to deep tumor tissues XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR, but also increases the sensitivity of resistant cancer cells to chemotherapeutic drugs by inhibiting the expression of efflux transporters such as multidrug resistance associated protein 1 (MRP1) XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR.
